org.jboss.gravia.runtime.spi

Interface ModuleEntriesProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClassLoaderEntriesProvider

    public interface ModuleEntriesProvider
    A provider for module entries.

    To discover and return module entries the runtime must delegate to specifc module type dependent implementations

    • OSGi: The Bundle entries API
    • Tomcat: The ServletContext resource API
    • WildFly: The JBoss Modules entries API
    Since:
    27-Sep-2013
    Author:
    thomas.diesler@jboss.com

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<URL> findEntries(String path, String filePattern, boolean recurse)
      Find entries in this module.
      URL getEntry(String path)
      Returns a URL to the entry at the specified path in this module.
      List<String> getEntryPaths(String path)
      Returns an Enumeration of all the paths (String objects) to entries within this module whose longest sub-path matches the specified path.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntryPaths

        List<String> getEntryPaths(String path)
        Returns an Enumeration of all the paths (String objects) to entries within this module whose longest sub-path matches the specified path.
        See Also:
        Module.getEntryPaths(String)

      • getEntry

        URL getEntry(String path)
        Returns a URL to the entry at the specified path in this module. This module's class loader is not used to search for the entry. Only the contents of this module are searched for the entry.
        See Also:
        Module.getEntry(String)

      • findEntries

        List<URL> findEntries(String path,
                    String filePattern,
                    boolean recurse)
        Find entries in this module. This module's class loader is not used to search for entries.
        See Also:
        Module.findEntries(String, String, boolean)
